Dancing Queen - Size Large, Full Charge is an Indian Marathi language television reality dance show which aired on Zee Marathi. It was hosted by Adwait Dadarkar and judged by Sonalee Kulkarni and RJ Malishka. The show premiered on 24 September 2020 airing Thursday to Saturday, and ended on 27 December 2020 with the Grand Finale after completing 43 episodes.
Finalists
* Pranali Chavan (Winner)
* Apoorva Undalkar
* Sangeeta Tamata
* Sneha Deshmukh
* Deepali Nemale
* Dipti Nair
